title.rendered: Eye care and cataract detection camp at Bilaspur and Palampur

content.rendered: A special eye care cum cataract detection camp was conducted at Palampur and Bilaspur, Himachal Pradesh from the 6th to 10th of April 2017. A total of 449 elderly people attended the camp at the cataract detection camp of which 120 patients were identified for surgery. Special tests and screenings were done before conducting the surgery so that the best possible treatment could be rendered to the people. All the surgeries were completed successfully and the people were greatly benefitted from the camp and were happy that their vision was restored.
